sense.def:
Izraz
a thing
uporabljamo kot nadomestilo za druge besede, kadar ne želimo biti natančnejši, kadar govorimo o nečem že omenjenem ali kadar bomo več podrobnosti o tistem povedali v nadaljevanju.

seg.quote: He needed a few things so we went to the store to purchase them.
It's silly to train a group of people just to do one thing.
A terrible thing happened to me on my way to work.
The fourth drawer holds family things such as photographs and letters.

sense.def:
A thing
je predmet, ne pa rastlina, žival ali človeško bitje.

seg.quote: He's only interested in things and not people.

sense.def:
One's things
so človekove obleke in lastnina.

seg.quote: She changed into her bathing things.
I like my own things around me: my photos and books.

sense.def:
Izraz
things
se nanaša na življenje nasploh in to, kako življenje vpliva na nas.

seg.quote: Things are going very well for us at the moment.

sense.def:
Izraz
a thing
lahko uporabimo tudi za osebo ali žival, ko izražamo svoja čustva do tiste osebe.

seg.quote: She was very cold, poor thing.
I can't come on Thursday. The thing is, I've already arranged to do something on Thursday.

sense.def:
Izraz
for one thing
uporabimo, kadar želimo navesti samo en razlog za nekaj, zraven pa opozoriti, da jih je še več.

seg.quote: I prefer badminton to squash. It's not so tiring for one thing.

sense.def:
Izraz
it is just one of those things
pomeni, da ne znamo pojasniti, zakaj se nekaj dogaja.

To have or make a thing about someone or something
pomeni gojiti močna čustva do nekoga ali nečesa in mu pripisovati velik pomen;

cit.quote: imeti nekaj proti, iti na živce

seg.quote: I've got a thing about drinking.
He made a big thing of not eating chilli.
